title: RQuiz

metadata.description: Learn about RQuiz with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
You can test your R skills with ' Quiz.
The Test
The test contains 25 questions and there is no time limit.
The test is not official, it's just a nice way to see how much you know, or don't know, about 
R.
Count Your Score
You will get 1 point for each correct answer. At the end of the Quiz,
your total score will be displayed. Maximum score is 25 points.
Start the Quiz
Good luck!
Start the R Quiz ❯
If you do not know R, we suggest that you read our
R Tutorial
from scratch.

★
+1

summary: This tutorial covers RQuiz concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use RQuiz effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of RQuiz and how to apply it in your projects.
